name: Disaster on a desert island
description:
This 'rts' /  'simulation' is a strategy game where you have to try and raise your population to 200 against all odds. Your population will need feeding but for that you'll need farms and those need wood and gold, however everything will be being recked by natural disasters.

This game has a range of difficulties however all of them are still challenging so I would recomend glancing at the manual even if you dont fully read it, which I would still recomend.

Anyway this game was made in less that 60 hours, because sleep exists, so I hope you enjoy playing it :D
